title: store bug
body: i bought some RP from the store and I didn't recieve it. So i purchased some more to be sure and i still haven't recieved it

replies.body:
Have you received the RP by now? If not, hit us up in a support ticket and one of our awesome billing specialists will work with you to sort this out.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask. ^.^
